thread.title: Short Seller Says Real Nutriceutical ‘Fabricated’ Results
thread.title_full: Short Seller Says Real Nutriceutical ‘Fabricated’ Results - WSJ

author: Gregor Stuart Hunter
title: Short Seller Says Real Nutriceutical ‘Fabricated’ Results
text:
Shares of Real Nutriceutical Group Ltd. fell 8.3% in Hong Kong trading after short seller Glaucus Research Group California LLC issued a report Thursday saying the company’s actual income is far below earnings reported to investors and regulators.
Shares in the Hong Kong-based company, which sells amino acid-based nutritional supplements and health drinks in China, fell to 1 Hong Kong dollar after publication of the report. The Hong... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
